general_info.summary: This document outlines guidelines for several key aspects of foreign visitor and resident management, including visa and FRO/FRRO procedures, medical insurance requirements, and observership programs. These guidelines are presented as a list of distinct categories.
general_info.raw_content:
Guidelines for Visa and FRO/FRRO
Guidelines for Medical Insurance
Observership Programmes
